EmailTemplate.description: US-0009491 - MyTrailhead - Create Trailmix assignement Email
EmailTemplate.name: MyTrailhead Trailmix Email Template
EmailTemplate.subject: 🐝 Hive University: New Trailmix {!trailheadapp__Trailmix__c.Name} assigned to you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!trailheadapp__User_Trailmix__c.OwnerFirstName__c},
a new learning Trailmix has been assigned to you:
{!trailheadapp__User_Trailmix__c.Trailmix_Name__c}
Description: {!trailheadapp__User_Trailmix__c.Description__c}
Stay up-to-date with our latest Hive features by completing this important training,
Team Hive
Start Course Now
